Message.Title: Caris & Company raised Ebay target from $54 to $61.Today
Message.Msg: Ebay: Caris & Company reiterated its rating of Above Average for this company and changed its price target from $54 to $61. This should push Ebay above $53+ Friday. They are geting close to the $62.25 target that I set.
